answers.answer: I've been getting swelling too. Not as bad, just enough to know about it. My fingers are getting it the worst. Other than cool water to relieve some of the pain all I can suggest is to talk to a doctor

My ankles are huge cant wear shoes or walk for more then a few mins without pain. I asked my dr last app and she said that aslong as my blood pressure is good other than it been uncomfortable its not a problem just to try and stay off my feet keep them raised up and gentle massage can help. Good luck

Thank you ladies! Its been really warm here so that hasn't helped much. I just wish there was something to relieve the swelling. If someone ever finds a cure for this during pregnancy... They'll be rich!
There are compression socks or stockings I heard. You could look into buying those!
Go to your OB RIGHT AWAY, IT SOUNDS LIKE PREECLAMPSIA! Its very dangerous for you, you need to get checked right AWAY please!!!!! please!!! :-) there is a chance I am wrong but please...
in re-reading this I saw that monday was your dr app. well today was monday... are you all right? what did your dr say? I hope your ok.

question: I'm 38 weeks pregnant ftm. I've had ankle and foot swelling for months now... Its been tolerable. But the last few days it has spread and now my entire legs are swollen (up to thighs),and fingers/hands too. And it hurts to bend or even touch my knees and fingers. Extreme stiffness! Im absolutely miserable. I see my ob on Monday. But is this common?? To have swelling increase so much along with severe stiffness/pain?? And is there ANYTHING that will help?? I'm desperate for relief!! Oh lordy help me... :(
title: Increased swelling and pain ADVICE PLEASE!
